overview:
David Travers grew up working every odd job in his familyâ€™s business. His admiration for business creators began with his Dad and has grown into a passion for providing entrepreneurs with the capital and support to help them succeed. Prior to joining Rustic Canyon in 2005, David worked at eBay, where he focused on the growth of the sports, toys, collectibles and media marketplaces. Previously, David worked on corporate strategy at The Walt Disney Company and helped launch Disneyâ€™s credit card business. Prior to that, David served as Executive Assistant to the National Security Advisor in the White House and was awarded the Secretary of Defenseâ€™s Award for Outstanding Public Service.

David loves sports and his favorite activities include going to yoga class with his wife, playing at the park with his daughter and working to support his favorite after school program, LAâ€™s BEST.

Education: David earned an MBA from Harvard Business School and a BA from Stanford University.
